name: Cheryl Phillips
text: Beautiful birds and a nice supply of bird things.

name: Emily Pearson
text: I LOVE THEM!!!!! I got my baby birdie splits from them. My whole family loves to go and see peaches and Lola. They are very helpful and its nice to get a hands on experience with the birds.

name: Suzanne
text: Michael who I guess is the owner was extremely helpful. He ordered 4 happy huts for me in yellow. They are very hard to find. Our bird of course did not know how hard they were to find lol she is 23 years old a blue crown so alas we are using one for spare parts to add to her happy hut she has had for ever. I found everyone I encountered wonderful at Bird Buffet. Even when I asked to return 3 of them Michael was more than accommodating. What can I say you find gems in the world and Bird Buffet N Things is one of those gems.

name: Preen Acres Parrots
text: Excellent company. I order my bird's pelleted food in bulk and pick it up at the local bird fair. They have just about anything you need to properly care for your birds.  I don't buy from anyone else! Great prices!

name: Katherine Macon
text: They are very nice and they have everything you need for your pet bird's

name: Pamela Wimbley
text: We visit this company all the time at the bird shows but decided to visit the shop ,The family owned shop is very friendly and my birds like his  feed

name: Brian West
text: They go above and beyond for me and my birds!!!
